abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of (i) construction
            of the 280 MW second stage of the Guatape hydroelectric
            power station; (ii) a 230 kV transmission line from Guatape
            to load centers; (iii) expansion of the distribution system
            in EPM's service area.
